frontmatter.title: Secret Life of Bees
frontmatter.description: 5★ - This is a new musical by Duncan Sheik, known for his work on Spring Awakening. Although I had high expectations, I was surprised by how good it turned out to be. The musical is consistently great, and I predict that it will become very popular.
